an6.66:1.1: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an6.66:1.3: Thinaṃ, middhaṃ, uddhaccaṃ, kukkuccaṃ, assaddhiyaṃ, pamādaṃ—
an6.66:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an6.66:2.1: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an6.66:2.3: Thinaṃ, middhaṃ, uddhaccaṃ, kukkuccaṃ, assaddhiyaṃ, pamādaṃ—
an6.66:2.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātun”ti.
